attributes.action: allow the proposed sale to proceed potentially saving £110b of public money, up to 6000 jobs, possible EU fines and avoiding shareholder litigation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There exists an option open to Government to sell the Northern Rock now it has been nationalized and redeem its record for fiscal prudence. This would immediately remove all need of Government subsidies, guarantees and financial support. The 6,000 Northern Rocks jobs would be secure and the shareholder litigation avoided together with potential EU fines. Since each UK resident has a circ. £5,000 at stake in this banks future it is inappropriate that the panacea is being ignored.

rejection.details: The call for the Government to sell Northern Rock is fine, but the extra detail contains unsubstantiated claims.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
